Vanishing 3 [i](This creature enters with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)[/i]
[i]Magical Storm[/i] – Whenever a time counter is removed from Yatsuhashi and Benben, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
[i]Illusory Recital[/i] – Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, you may add or remove a time counter from Yatsuhashi and Benben.
